member.name: F:AntiRE.Runtime.Alert.NotepadStyle
member.summary: Style of alert message (true = Notepad, false = MessageBox : NotSecure)

member.name: F:AntiRE.Runtime.Alert.AutoClose
member.summary: Auto close message box after preferred time (Default = false)

member.name: F:AntiRE.Runtime.Alert.AutoCloseTime
member.summary: Time (seconds) to close the message (Default = 2)

member.name: F:AntiRE.Runtime.Alert.NotepadPath
member.summary: Notepad file path

member.name: F:AntiRE.Runtime.AntiDebugger.SelfDelete
member.summary: Program will be closed and deleted if debugger detected (Default = false)

member.name: F:AntiRE.Runtime.AntiDebugger.AlertMessage
member.summary: Text of alert message

member.name: F:AntiRE.Runtime.AntiDebugger.KeepAlive
member.summary: Keep anti debugger service alive until program closed (Default = true)

member.name: F:AntiRE.Runtime.AntiDebugger.ShowAlert
member.summary: Show a alert message in notepad if debugger detected (Default = true)

member.name: M:AntiRE.Runtime.AntiDebugger.Start(System.Diagnostics.Process)
member.summary: Start the anti debugger service

member.name: F:AntiRE.Runtime.AntiDnspy.SelfDelete

member.summary: Text of alert message

member.summary: Check for dnspy

member.name: M:AntiRE.Runtime.AntiDump.Parse(System.Type)
member.summary: Prevent assembly being dumped from memory (not stable may cause some problems)
